title: Why can cold callers still leave voicemail, despite me blocking the number and adding it to spam?
content:
I want to prevent cold callers from being able to leave voicemails.
I have added the callers number to my block list and treated as spam etc, yet they are still able to go directly to my voicemail and leave voice messages!
I get no ring notification for their call, because it's blocked and treated as spam, but I do get the voicemail left icon display, once they have left their message!
I have done some research and it appears that Google has an app that can deal with this, called Google Voice, yet this only currently works in the USA!
I bought a Google phone to be able to be better protected and to receive regular updates etc, it seems ridiculous to me not to be able to utilise this Google app on a Google phone here in the UK!
I'm really fed up with these regular unwanted and unsolicited voicemail calls and want them stopped!
